title: The Pleasure Instinct (Excerpt)
description:
The reasons behind the things we like are explained in The Pleasure Instinct: Why We Crave Adventure, Chocolate, Pheromones, and Music. From the smell of cocoa to the scent of a lover, there's much to learn about our gut reactions. This book won't be available in stores until mid-December 2008.

Written by Gene Wallenstein
Credit to Windows Secrets Newsletter [http://windowssecrets.com].
Please note this is an excerpt and not the full book.

Enjoy, and seed if you like it!
